<->( Minimum System Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

OS: Windows XP/Vista
Processor: Pentium 4 @ 2.8 GHz (3.2 GHz for Vista)
Memory: 1 GB
Hard Drive: 10 GB Free
Video Memory: 256 MB (nVidia GeForce 7800 GT/ATI Radeon X1950)
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
DirectX: 9.0c

<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->


1.: Unrar with 7zip or Equivalent to a short path like c: d: e: f: or whatever.

2.: double click: setup-XP.exe or setup-ViSTA.exe ( must be done )

3.: Run game from desktop, Select your desired Language from desktop.


( directX and redist. files are all included!.)

Some antivirus software with heuristics set to HIGH process, checks may

If this happens add the exe to a white/exclusion list at your virustool to avoid any 

kind of these issue's!.
